text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the enforceability and necessity of including specific provisions (like liquidation preference, transfer restrictions via tag/drag-along, and board/observer rights) within the contractual framework (SHA) that governs the GmbH, contrasting them with statutory rights.
